website_summaries.verdict: Self-propelled and easy to assemble, this bagged model is a good alternative for those who want to avoid the dusty task of emptying canisters.
pros: The self-propelled feature means this model can cover a room without requiring much exertion from the user
Initial assembly and bag replacement are simple, and the vacuum includes an indicator light that illuminates when the bag needs changing
The wide head allows for covering more area quickly
cons: Some users report the wheels wear out or break and require replacing with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: Had vacuum 1 month and 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum a little over a month (delivered 11/12/17). I live alone in a one room studio apartment, so I don't need to vacuum very often. In fact I have not had to replace the bag yet Tonite, the hose became unglued from the end that fits inside the vacuum and also attaches to the accessory. In other words, without the hose connected the machine or the accessory-it is useless. The glue just gave way-nothing broke or tore. I would like to have to hose replaced. If this is not possible, I'll need to return this vacuum and the additional bags I bought. By the way, I've been pleased with the suction.
customer_reviews.author: cybercyl

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. Bought this for my son and four months after purchase, the head stopped functioning. The product has a 1 year warranty and I purchased an additional 3 years of coverage through Amazon. Unfortunately, Dirt Devil's customer service is severely lacking. They won't help us unless we can take the vacuum to one of their service centers, but according to their site, there isn't one within 100 miles.Incredibly frustrating experience with a company that will no longer get my business.
customer_reviews.author: cjcalifornia

customer_reviews.title: doesn't hold up well
customer_reviews.text: A powerful vacuum. Couldn't ask for more at such a low price. 7 month update. Took two stars away. The plastic connecter tube just came off the hose and cannot be fastened back on. Very cheaply made compared to the original of this model which lasted 8 years before anything broke. If you buy this, get the extended warranty. Now I have to drag it to a shop to get repaired. I only use it once a month, which means has only been used 7 times.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Latman

customer_reviews.title: two big issues with it... 1. ...
customer_reviews.text: two big issues with it... 1. all vacuum bags gets rupture inside because the cover have two sharp edges near to 'vacuum bag check(how much filled)' which breaks the vacuum bags all the time and mess-up. 2. wheels came out (both) after just 6 months...dirt devil has to change the design for bag rupture issue...
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: It is a sweeper. It works. I break sweepers with regularity. They do not last in my house! I am not spending hundreds on one because I can destroy any sweeper, so I keep them cheaper. Works fine for me. Sweepers and irons have a tough go with me. I use them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Unsuitable cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this vaccum now for a few months. For an 87 year old it's light weight, but that is about all I can say about it. Doesn't pick up well...blows dirt & dust back onto the floor. We've checked the 'bag' and it doesn't seem to need a new bag, but then I can't be sure because locally I haven't found a replacement bag. I intend to find one on Amazon. It's also very loud. The hose keeps falling on to the floor so it's constantly picking it up. There isn't any place to 'lock' the hose to keep it in place. We just can't afford to buy another vaccum.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Correll

customer_reviews.title: It sucks in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Love my "Satan Sucker"! It goes together in a few minutes. Glides smoothly, love the feature to change from bare floors to thick carpet, love having all the attachments right there when I want them, easy to change from floor vac to hand-held hose attachments. I keep a 6' extension cord attached to the regular cord (so I can do my entire apartment without unplugging it) and it fits on the cord-winder on the back. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E. Goodling

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive vacuum
customer_reviews.text: New version of my old vacuum, which I loved. Pros, longer and easier to use hose and height adjustment and light. Cons, doesn't pick up as well as the old one, only 10 amps instead of 12, and has a cheaper plastic quality about it. Thankful to have it, it works pretty good, and would recommend anyway because it's a good vacuum for those like me who can't afford the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jo

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY-UPGRADE OR LOOK ELSEWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's office, which has very light traffic and rarely needs vacuuming. Altogether, he's probably used it once a month over 14-16 months to pick up surface dirt--nothing that should have troubled the machine or even filled the bag. It died today! He immediately assumed there was a problem with the receptacle and plugged in several other machines--no such luck. I'm completely disgusted and will NOT purchase anything thing else from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Perry

customer_reviews.title: Purpose is not served at all.
customer_reviews.text: Its not working just after three month and few days. Dirt Devil Vacuum Cleaner Featherlite Corded Bagged Upright Vacuum UD30010
customer_reviews.author: Shaikh Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Easy to maneuver. Does a good job even on my thick shag rug. Just be careful not to run over the corner of thin area rugs. The corner of the rug got pulled in and shredded. Powerful machine.
customer_reviews.author: Aka's mom

customer_reviews.title: They fixed the few things I hated about my old vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely improved from the older model we had. They fixed the few things I hated about my old vacuum. The hose is flexible and longer and the height selection seems to work better. My older one would get so hot and smelly when I was vacuuming my thick carpet. Great job Dirt Devil! One more improvement would be for the beater brushes to quit moving when you are using the hose attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fernelius

customer_reviews.title: I am a long time Dirt Devil owner. With ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time Dirt Devil owner. With this machine, I got what I paid for: an inexpensive vacuum that is made of plastic. I am forever popping the wheels back on. I have dogs, laminate floors, and live in the high desert. I wanted something to get the job done quickly without all the dust that sweeping creates. I will use this until it dies.
customer_reviews.author: TapestryFS

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my older dirt devil upright and picked this one. The new dirt devil upright is sooo much better. They made some much needed improvements in the way that the hose plugs into the head, made the hose longer and incorporated a rug height adjustment. This machine is still very light weight, but does a much better job. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst vacuum cleaner I have ever purchased. Do not know why dirt devil changed from their older model. The older version certainly performs or I should say does circles around this new what I consider to be a piece of junk. Enough said. you have my personal opinion based on experience.
customer_reviews.author: njsl

customer_reviews.title: The best Dirt Devil!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my last Dirt Devil because when I moved to another city one of the wheels broke off. The vacuum still works fine, but impossible to roll on carpet. I chose this one because the wheels were different and the height was adjustable. Easy to put together out of the box (4 screws) and it's been zooming around my house cleaning all day!
customer_reviews.author: Oops! Invalid URL! Please check parameters in the web address.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum a few months ago....just like an earlier version of the Dirt Devil that I purchased in 2015 that literally had the wheels fall off, this one is garbage as well. The hose cracked near the base, rendering the suction to any attachments useless. Next time I will purchase something of quality versus flushing away $60 every few months on a model that needs to be replaced constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Decent baged sweeper for very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. I assembled this in five minutes. The vacuum sweeper is light weight and has good suction. Great sweeper for the price. Bagged sweepers becoming more difficult to find. This is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stavarz

customer_reviews.title: Plugs up a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have had more problems with this dirt devil!!! All it does it plugs up and spits out dirt from the front. I have to mess with it till it decides to work, then when I change the bag it starts to plug up again till I mess with a bunch of stuff.... and No I am not placing the bag on wrong. I will never buy another dirt devil.. back to hoover I go!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous version of the Dirt Devil Featherlite brand from about 10 years ago that was great. When it finally died I thought I would try this one but was disappointed. The suction on this vacuum was terrible. Dirt just seemed to clog the hose where it went into the vacuum. Also everything on it seems very cheaply made and assembled. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: North332

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bagged Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bagless vacuums for a while and they never quite lived up to the bagged version. Upon first use(I got it today), it has far exceeded my expectations. I love it and I don't think I can go back to bagless. I don't have to worry about dust flying around when changing the bag, like I would if I were dealing with a bagless vac. All I have to do is change bags. No mess, no fuss. One of my better purchases in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: locheree white

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is one of the best, effective, versatile vac's on the market at a very fair price. Great on Carpets and other floor surfaces like wood. This is the third Featherlite I have purchased. I find they last on average about eight to ten years.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for picking up after pets. Sometimes it will not pick up but the air blowing out of the vacuum will send other particles from the ground flying on hard floors (crumbs, sand, etc.). Suction is very good. For a relatively inexpensive option as far as vacuums go, you're really getting a lot for the price. I would recommend, works well on carpet and hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have periodic needs for a beater bar vacuum for carpets and area rugs. This Feather lite was the thing. Easy to assemble, lightweight and I love the bag cleaner over the bagless. The bag is so much easier to clean; take it out throw it away put in a new bag. With the bagless vacuums you have to empty canisters; wash; and make sure the fine particles of dust are removed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Turn back while there's still time.
customer_reviews.text: The first one's motor turned on and off while I was using it for the first time. The replacement came and the hose was crushed. I really needed to clean my house so I decided to keep it. The hose constantly comes out of the floor unit, which is extremely frustrating while I'm vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Yahtzee

customer_reviews.title: I love the old model because it has a powerful suction ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the old model because it has a powerful suction for the price and its a very simple unit which is reliable. This unit barely sucks when you want to use the hose and after two uses it clearly won't be able to handle regular use. Horrible unit.
customer_reviews.author: JonZ

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it - 2 months later Follow Up.....
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works as well as or even better than ones 3 times more expensive. I love it. FOLLOW UP REVIEW - Cleaner was working great but after a couple months, we get shocked every time we use it. No matter where in both homes) Afraid to use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Souza

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum. I had one that you had to empty out every room it was a real pain and it didn't last very long. The price on this is so cheap and it does such a good job. I will buy again if I need to
customer_reviews.author: Terri Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, really cheap material. It’s like if you put a motor in a kids vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Hose came off of the connector after a month, called dirt devil and even though it was only month old, not under warranty. The replacement connector was $45 with shipping, only paid like 39.99 for the vacuum. No more dirt devil.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Keep the bags!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sweeper for the price. Yes, I still call them sweepers. It does a great job and the bags are much easier to deal with than cleaning out those bag less ones... Yuk
customer_reviews.author: C. Boileau

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, But Strictly Light Duty
customer_reviews.text: I had an old commercial Featherlite which I was very impressed with, so when our home sweeper died, I knew what I wanted. The new vacuum is very lightweight and has a bright light which helps in those dark corners. The biggest surprise was how quiet it runs and the ease of putting the sweeper together. The only con is that the sweeper (unlike the commercial unit) is a light duty home model, but it's perfect for us and our sweeping needs.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNOMADS

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY FROM DIRT DEVIL FEATHERLITE VACUUMS.....They are not a quality product.. Conveniently the hose attachment that plugs into the base separates from the gray piece and comes out because the glue is terrible. It is impossible to reattach to the gray piece no matter what you do. You have lost a long time customer.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Decker

customer_reviews.title: Suitable For My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I've always purchased Dirt Devil vacs over the years and they've worked well. While this is cheaply made, it does what it's supposed to for a small, carpeted apartment. I would prefer that it was bagless but that's my fault for not reading the description well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tender Moon

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice vacuum but the front piece falls off constantly. There also seems to be alot of dirt that blows to the side and doesn't get sucked up at the first go around.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as good as the cheap Dirt Devils used to, but nothing does anymore. Sadly I gave my cheap one away when I bought a fancy new bagless vacuum (stupid, stupid, stupid). Still works good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Sucks it up
customer_reviews.text: I love my new vacuum. Well its the new version of my old dirt devil which I had for over 10 years. So when it was time for a new one, it was a no brainier on what I was gonna purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... an older Featherlight Dirt Devil Vacuum that is much better than the one I just bought
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Featherlight Dirt Devil Vacuum that is much better than the one I just bought. The suction isn't as good as the older one. They are making these much cheaper. Buy a better vacuum cleaner than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steppenwolf

customer_reviews.title: You will have problems sooner than later
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these at my work. Wheels have fallen off of all 3 units. Very loud, and hose comes out of base unit often. They are good because they are cheap, but make no mistake they are not worth it. As soon as I use all the bags and supplies I will be picking a better model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Dirt Devil vacuum. My first lasted 5+ years. Nice bang for the buck. This one has broken after 9 months. It has been redesigned and is much flimsier than the 1st one. The hose just separated from where its attached to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: SharonDee

customer_reviews.title: Great hand vac
customer_reviews.text: Long hose, Great suction with hose as a hand vacuum. Horrible for proper floor cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: sarah g.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dirt Devil! I do not need an ultra strong made-for-a-life-time vacuum. Tis light weight model is easy for me to carry, cleans like a whiz and has all the attachments you would expect. I highly recommend this vacuum. Packaging was in great condition and delivered right ontime.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Easy light weight Vacuum for dorms.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my college student staying in an apartment with all carpets. Its light weight and took 15 minutes to assemble. Seems to be doing an OK job to the price point. If it last 2 years I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Spaul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent decision to buy this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I switched back to a bag vacuum cleaner after about 10 years of backless. Since then, I notice my carpet is cleaner, and the pet odor is decrease as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It only lasted four days before messing up. The hose comes off during vacuuming way to easily. Had one years ago that was awesome but I am done with dealing with devils. #notanymoresatan
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, it's just not as good as an older model I had of this that was 12 amps and automatically adjusted for floor or carpet heights. I'm still figuring out the best setting for the living room carpet. I'm afraid to make it too low and too high results in ineffective cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Beats bagless any day!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love “bag” vacuums! Being that it’s of lightweight construction, it’s not going to take rough handling. I’ve had it for a while now with no problems. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Wielgopolski

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long but good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vacuum in April 2017 and before reaching one year it was not fully picking up dirt. Also at some point the rotor brush stopped spinning. As of this writing it's unavailable for purchase but if they do start selling it again maybe go for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Fox

customer_reviews.title: Bought this thinking that it would work based off of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking that it would work based off of the reviews. Starting clogging up on me. Unfortunately, it's passed the window to return. I should've bought a Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut 1

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2015, still in use in 2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum in 2015? I'm still riding it 5years later in 2020! I've changed the U-shaped bag a few times over the years! But I never did see the little yellow indicator pop up to tell me when to change. Either way, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hope S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money buying this. I have carpet laid through my yownhome and this valcupm did not suck up anything. I bought additional bags because I was going to use it weekly but every time I finished valculming, the bag was always empty. I ended up tossing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 6 months and about 8 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. For its price, unsurprising. Cord pooped out and Hose extension tore. broken within 6 months of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PJ LA Woman

customer_reviews.title: Not for long time use
customer_reviews.text: The suction is horrible....the product feels like it could self-destruct every time you use it...not very sturdy..... disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Durable cheap vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It is made of cheap plastic. It is light weight and easy to carry around. It can use the cheap 99 cents bags.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful vacuum.Great suction.Easy to use for someone with mobility issues.I gave it 4 stars because I think a longer cord would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: demdu

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum! Honestly I have a Dyson as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! Honestly I have a Dyson as well and I actually think I prefer this vacuum. I used to have the same one and gave it to a friend when I moved. I have recently purchased it again and the quality is just as good as it always has been. Good for carpet and rugs!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: this is almost all plastic, save for some screws needs to secure all the plastic pieces together. It definitely is not sturdy, but so far it's sucking, so it gets the job done. There are no fancy cleaning tools, just a hose with a sofa brush.
customer_reviews.author: johndoe13

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where this vacuum would be of any use for cleaning any floor surface. It wasn't worth even the small price it was selling for. Threw it in the trash after only three weeks. Or, maybe it was two. Not even good enough for small jobs. Don't waste your money. You will regret purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cool vac
customer_reviews.text: Amazing what they can fabricate from plastic these days.. Almost the entire thing (minus the motor) is plastic. Despite this it works rather well. For 50 +/- $ it's effective and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: JC859

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I have wood floors so I mostly use the attachment to pick up dust and loose dirt off the floor. The vacuum does a good job for this purpose. However, it does not seem to have good suction on carpet. I recommend something more powerful for carpet. I like how light it is and it has a bag so I don’t have to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light and good suction quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used Dirt Devils for a long time! I had to replace one, so I bought another one. This one is just as good quality as the others, and the price is very good. I do not like bagless vacuums, so this is the one I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greatest suction of any vacuuming machine I have ever had. Also light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I clean homes for a living. I have ordered one before for a customer. This recent one that I ordered has been updated. I like the new features.
customer_reviews.author: bab

customer_reviews.title: Suction O.K.
customer_reviews.text: The suction in the hose is fantastic. The suction by the roller/brush is weak and the roller does not move on a motor. I'm actually trying to find out if the one I got is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L.

customer_reviews.title: the fan on the side blows all the fur, ...
customer_reviews.text: the fan on the side blows all the fur, dust whatever I'm vacuuming away. Not sure why it is designed that way. My last one (different brand) was similar and a low end model so maybe it's that? My dog sheds tons so it's hard to keep up when the vacuum actually blows the fur around in a vortex!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So light and works great
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and pick up. So light. Vacuums great
customer_reviews.author: Faemous

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum work's well but the wheel's are cheap and fell off after 3 week's. The handle is also sharp in spot and may cause you to get cut if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: joshua bacsi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. Very lightweight and does a good job. The attachments are nice, too. Bought a second one right away for a vacation home.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Yup, you get what you pay for. Total disappointment, only lasted for a few months. The hose kept clogging and the the waste never went to the disposable bag. Totally useless!
customer_reviews.author: *shaka*

customer_reviews.title: We are happy. It is truly light and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: We are happy. It is truly light and easy to handle. It cleans our carpet and that is really important. We have cats and it sweeps up the cat hair. Must be because I am older but I like the bag sweepers and their performance much better than the tunnel sweepers that are out now.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Long

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight devil!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. She went bag-less for a while and would jam it up even though you could see it was beyond full. It will be funny when she is back to the bag again and fills the bag and hose fill. I have it down though. I have a shop vac, that sucks the hose clean no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Calspete

customer_reviews.title: This Dirt Devil has all the bells and whistles and good features. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A rarity. Can't find many BAGGED vacuums in stores anymore especially DIRT DEVIL. I had a DIRT DEVIL for many many years and replaced it with a bagless - not worth it. This Dirt Devil has all the bells and whistles and good features. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: it work verry well it pick up every thing it ...
customer_reviews.text: it work verry well it pick up every thing it worth the money
customer_reviews.author: perry  F  wiLson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this one
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. Ima little afraid that it will not hold up tho. its very lightweight. My previous one lasted almost 20 years. It was a more expensive popular brand tho. So far so good with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I luv this product and would definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vampyre

customer_reviews.title: Great power, cleans carpet very well and is nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great power, cleans carpet very well. Wish there was a switch to cutoff the roller brush for hard wood flooring, doesn't pick up items that well on hard surfaces and tends to kick them around rather than pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: AFLMyers

customer_reviews.title: but this vacuum is so light and easy to manuver
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most enjoyable and efficient vacuum I have ever used. I absolutely detest vacuuming, but this vacuum is so light and easy to manuver, it makes the job tolerable. It also has a nice light on the front, which works well. But really, the best thing about this vacuum is that the exhaust fan blows out the side instead of the front, which some other vacuum cleaners do ( I never understood that). I absolutely recommend this vacuum cleaner to anyone wanting a light and efficient vacuum cleaner. Thank you Dirt Devil for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: No fuss no mess
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and it gets the job done. No more nasty messy bagless vacuum for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it will not last more than a two to three months
customer_reviews.text: at start picked up and worked properly on normal carpet. after 2-3 months the motor starts smoking.
customer_reviews.author: JAVID H.

customer_reviews.title: very good suction power
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Devil quality, very good suction power. Keeps the carpet nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst piece if crap i have ever purchased in my 55 years of life.it has no suction.the little that it barely picks up it spits back onto the rug.very disappointed with this purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia b smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a good vacuum, I wanted a bagged vacuum because I was looking for a bagged vacuum cleaner, I got so tired of just finding bagless vacuums since when you have to empty them out dust goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: I love a vacuum with a BAG
customer_reviews.text: I love a vacuum with a BAG. I hated cleaning out the bagless type. This is lightweight but powerful and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: nancy trense

customer_reviews.title: Great basic vacuum with hose
customer_reviews.text: Great basic vacuum with hose. Not gonna rock your world, but will get the job done and worth it because it's so light and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum itself works wonderful, but after 3-4 months both back wheels broke ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself works wonderful, but after 3-4 months both back wheels broke off. Makes it tough to use. I'll have to order a new one diferent brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this vacuum cleaner. It is light, but has good suction. I also really like that it has a long, flexible hose. I can reach the ceiling trim and corners with the crevice tool without having to pick up the whole vacuum cleaner. If it holds up over time this will be a great item that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mac25

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks of use, it started giving ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use, it started giving electric shocks upon use from the handle. Sadly, my window to return has closed.
customer_reviews.author: pjwardell

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vacuum but the bag is very small, I wouldnt purchase this for a large home or with wall to wall carpet. It works great for our rugs and hardwood floors. We bought 2 one for the main house and one for the guest house. It's very light and is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Epps

customer_reviews.title: It works 100% better than the Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this after getting fed up with the Dyson vacuum I have. It works 100% better than the Dyson. I have hard wood floors and several large area rugs. I also have a dog that sheds terribly year round. The Dirt Devil left no dog hair on the rugs where the Dyson left a lot. The suction is powerful, but the unit is also super light and easy to push. I would definitely recommend this vacuum. It is well worth the money. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Langlais

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job, only thing is I can't find attachments to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cristofani

customer_reviews.title: weak, doesn't clean well at all,
customer_reviews.text: very very weak. Not anywhere near as good as the heavier model
customer_reviews.author: Unanimouse

customer_reviews.title: Missing On-board tools(Turbo Tool showed in second picture).
customer_reviews.text: I like the vacuum and its performance, but, I did not receive all the On-board tools showed in product description. Missing handheld turbo tool showed in attached picture.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and maneuverabile!
customer_reviews.text: The light weight and maneuverability of this Dirt Devil make it so much easier to use than my old vacuum. The suction is great and it is so easy to vacuum the carpeted rooms as well as the hard surface rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. lite weight not to noisy
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it out. I love it. lite weight not to noisy. 2 day delivery, price was great..asembly was quick,only 3 screws.
customer_reviews.author: joemonk

customer_reviews.title: not as good as the old models but it gets the job ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, not as good as the old models but it gets the job done. Also just a heads up you will be assembling this yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little vacuum for the price, get clean very short carpet
customer_reviews.author: Darrell H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight but strong in suction
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight but strong in suction. Do not care for the side vent, it blows everything around. Good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum cleaner works but the power switch and the handle setting could use improvements.
customer_reviews.author: mgforshort

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Works great- I don't like the maintenance of a bagless and feel this actual does a better job. Also, you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Super Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to push! Sucks great! Bag is disposable so you're not carrying around all the germs and dirt with you like the bag-less types ... Best value for your money! And when it breaks, so cheap, you just get another .... Ours lasts 3-4 years, not bad for a 50.00 vac! Compared to others @ hundreds!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn MacMeekin

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Lasted only 6 months with light ...
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Lasted only 6 months with light use. Not even worth the time to box up and return.
customer_reviews.author: Michael OBrien

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Vacuum Cleaner Featherlite Corded Bagged Upright Vacuum UD30010
product_meta.description: The lightweight design is easy to push and easy to carry from room to room or up and down stairs. The powerful 10-amp motor gives you the power to pick up dust and dirt quickly.
feature_bullets: 13 inch wide cleaning path covers more surface area in shorter time
MicroFresh filtration traps more than 99% of dust and allergens
5-Position height adjustment- adjust to any type of carpet, plus hard floors
Includes a dusting brush, crevice tool and extension wand

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars522 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
